TestInformation.Title: Opus Codec Encoding
TestInformation.Description: Opus is an open audio codec. Opus is a lossy audio compression format designed primarily for interactive real-time applications over the Internet. This test uses Opus-Tools and measures the time required to encode a WAV file to Opus and then to decode the generated Opus file.
TestInformation.SubTitle: WAV, Opus Encode, Opus Decode
